title: Talisman
description: As the war between Angmar and Degarm continues to escalate, the Dragons confront the enmity of the Griffinkin as they search for three precious artifacts hidden by their great Dragon-leader Stormfire--the Diamond Dragon, the Glass Dragon, and the Heart of All Dragons--that when reunited will point the way to a new homeland for the Dragonkin, in the second volume in a new fantasy trilogy.
author: Robin Wayne Bailey
